index1: The following web-map survey is part of a research project at NOVA IMS (Lisbon). Its primary objective is to understand how citizens' place perceptions, and their relationships, influence participation in a given urban area.
index2: The questionnaire will take less than 5 minutes, and the mapping activity takes most people around 15 minutes, depending on how many areas you define.
index3: With your contribution, you will support the improvement of Lisbon municipality participation processes.
index8: 1. All data collected is treated with confidentiality and anonymity, and will not be used for commercial purposes or distributed to third parties. 2. For more information or questions about this study, please contact us using the following email address acedo@novaims.unl.pt (Albert Acedo Sánchez) or visit our blog.
index10: Please, select the parish where you live.
index13: How long have you lived there?
index18: Indique por favor o código postal da sua residência
index19: If you do not want to give your zip code, please click the checkbox.
index20: Please, select the most important problems in your parish. (Max. 3)
map1-4: We want to know where are the areas that, for some reason/s, are significant for you.
map1-5: Please, think about the area/s in which you:
map1-6: identify the most with (e.g., this place represents me)
map1-7: and/or feel attached to (e.g., I love this place)
map1-8: and/or depend on (e.g., it is the most suitable place for doing the things that I enjoy the most)
map1-9: Can you write words that define these areas? Write as many words as areas you have. Take your time :)
map1-10: Note: separate words by commas or the “enter” key.
map1-12: Please draw the area (hola) using the
map1-15: If you need, you can delete the area pressing button
map1-19: Do you live in that area?
map1-20: Please rate the area Y according to the following criteria: (On a scale of 0 to 5, where 0 is nothing and 5 is totally)
map1-22: Uses & Activities (fun, active, vital, useful. etc.)
map1-24: Access & Linkage (continuity, walkable, accessible, proximity, etc.)
map1-25: Choose the most important area to you.
map1-26: Please, answer the following questions regarding this area (X).
map1-28: Everything about this area (Y) is a reflection of me.
map1-31: I feel that I can really be myself at this area (Y).
map1-32: This area (Y) reflects the type of person I am.
map1-34: I feel relaxed when I’m at this area (Y).
map1-35: I feel happiest when I’m at this area (Y).
map1-36: This area (Y) is my favorite place to be.
map1-38: This area (Y) is the best place for doing the things that I enjoy most.
map1-39: For doing the things that I enjoy most, no other place can compare to this area (Y)
map1-40: This area (Y) is a good place to do the things I most like to do
map1-41: Let’s start!! – Please, read the following instructions carefully.
map1-42: This is a web-map survey application for Lisbon city. We invite you to draw areas on the map freely.
map1-44: at top-centre in the map part and then click on the map to plot your first point, and as many points as you need to define your area. To finish drawing an area, click on the first point again. You can edit the area moving any point at any time or delete it pressing the button
map1-44a: You can 'pan' the map or zoom in (+ or -) using the map controls and go directly to a certain freguesia using the button
map1-44b: You can draw as many areas as you need. The more meaningful areas you can draw, the better!
map1-46: After to define the areas we are going to ask you about these areas. So, please answer the questions regarding the areas when asked.
map1-48: This is all. When you finished defining your different areas, press the button (X) to move on to the next activity.
